entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:53 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 12:53 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:53 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
